alert.note: Alert for Bandera; Medina (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 18 at 10:49AM CST until December 18 at 11:30AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Medina County in south central Texas... Southern Bandera County in south central Texas... * Until 1130 AM CST. * At 1049 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tarpley, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations impacted include... Bandera, Tarpley, Lakehills, Bandera Falls, Hill Country State Natural Area, Mico and Lake Medina Shores. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
